meanings.definition: Skilled in deception or underhanded tactics.
meanings.sent1: The craftier fox outsmarted the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent2: She became craftier with each attempt to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The craftier raccoon managed to steal the picnic basket without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent4: Her craftier ways of negotiation made her a formidable opponent in business.
meanings.sent5: The craftier magician amazed the audience with his illusions.

meanings.definition: Showing skill in achieving one's ends through deceit or evasion.
meanings.sent1: The craftier spy managed to gather information without being detected.
meanings.sent2: He grew craftier as he navigated through the tricky situation.
meanings.sent3: The craftier student found a way to avoid doing the difficult assignment.
meanings.sent4: Her craftier tactics in the game led her team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The craftier politician manipulated the situation to his advantage.
